title: Waymo, which paused its service during blackouts in San Francisco on December 20, says it is updating its fleet to improve navigation during widespread outages (Ari Levy/CNBC)
summary: Ari Levy / CNBC: Waymo, which paused its service during blackouts in San Francisco on December 20, says it is updating its fleet to improve navigation during widespread outages — Three days after a blackout in San Francisco caused Waymo to pause it driverless car service, the Alphabet-owned company …
